text: 13.17 Kis 1.7, 6.6, 12.5, Lo 7.6-7, Sng 105.23-24 Chɨn Yislel binɨb mɨñɨl mɨdobun awl, bɨlel based yes chɨnop okok, God kɨlop aglɨl agak, Nɨbi binɨb yad yɨbɨl mɨdebɨm agak. Anɨb agɨl kɨlop dak ak nɨm, kɨdek kɨli man Yijip am yelaknɨŋ, kɨlop kod mɨdtep gek, ñɨpay gɨlɨl kuŋay yɨbɨl yelak agak. Pen kɨdek ñɨn ak, God tap mageptek okok gɨl, man Yijip kelɨgɨl kɨlop poŋɨd owak agak.
